message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product and your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $125.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $115 for the product.
I'm still open to negotiating, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $118. It's getting close to the value I had in mind, but I'm willing to make a slight concession.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $116 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $119. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $117 for the product.
